name: Bodyrain
description:
- Fast paced and precise shooting mechanics
- A wide variety of weapons and grenades to use against the hordes
- Many different types of zombies, each with different attacks and strategies
- 5 unique bosses to fight and beat the game
- The ability to level up your character and improve its attributes
- An infinite game mode on a special map
- Stunning stylized graphics and effects
- A dynamic soundtrack to slaughter zombies




Dawn City, once a bustling urban center, found itself suddenly plunged into darkness on a stormy September night. A disastrous scientific experiment resulted in the leakage of an experimental substance, turning the inhabitants into insatiable zombies.
To contain the threat, authorities imposed an impenetrable quarantine, isolating a portion the city from the rest of the world. Years passed, and Dawn City became a field of ruins. Gangs of survivors fought over scarce resources, while zombies ruled the dark, empty streets.
Amidst this chaos, an unlikely hero emerged: a zombie hunter known as "Raven." Clad only in makeshift armor and armed to the teeth, established an outpost on the outskirts of the city called Refuge of Hope. There, the fearless could accept missions to eradicate the undead in exchange for rewards.
Players, assuming the role of bounty hunters, ventured into the Urban Ruins in search of challenges. The locations were eerily familiar but now dominated by abandonment and despair. Once bustling streets were now dangerous, and once imposing buildings had become infested fortresses.

The goal is to completely eradicate all zombies from the quarantine and rebuild the city, with 5 of them being very difficult bosses to defeat, requiring the player to save money to improve their weapons and attributes to stand a chance against them.
